sub_title: Program Manager | Nike Workplace Design & Connectivity EMEA Cities | via Hill International
summary:
I am a visionary architectural professional with a track record of masterful spatial planning, quality assurance, and project management. Over the course of my career, I have acquired a reputation for my comprehensive expertise on the effects of urban planning on crime prevention.

Among my many talents is the ability to communicate effectively with proficiency in English, Greek, and French, with diverse clientele across all levels of business. I am adept at engaging in effective collaboration with cross-functional professionals. I am an outstanding team leader with a demonstrated capacity to supervise teams in high-volume environments by leveraging innovative leadership strategies.

In addition, I have proven stakeholder engagement, contract negotiation, and budget management skills. I possess an incredibly detail-oriented approach to duty execution, which is an integral trait for any professional within the construction sector. 

I am the proud holder of a Doctor of Philosophy in Urban and Regional Planning, as well as a Diploma of Architecture from the University of Patras. I have also obtained a Master of Science in Urbanism from the Technical University of Delft, and a Master of Art in Art History from the University of Leiden. I am of the firm belief that these qualifications, in combination with the practical experience I have acquired over the course of my career, have equipped me with the required skills and expertise to serve as an invaluable asset to any organisation!

authors.headline: Program Manager | Nike Workplace Design & Connectivity EMEA Cities | via Hill International

profile_positions.title: Program Manager | Nike Workplace Design & Connectivity EMEA Cities | via Hill International

profile_positions.description:
I provide spatial planning and workplace consultancy to corporate clientele, oriented towards business growth, as well as transformation. I deliver design proposals to clients and refine these according to their feedback. I produce conceptual designs, final designs, and zoning plans. I execute the development of a brand identity through interior design comprising furniture and materials, as well as through strategic colour selection. I develop requests for information (RFI) to aid the definition of the spatial requirements, as well as to enable the obtainment of funding by clientele. I oversee procurement activities, inclusive of contract negotiation and the preparation of tender packages, comprising the preparation of requests for quotation (RFQ). I support the implementation operations for projects, including budget reporting, construction, contractor management, and quality assurance. 

~  I fulfill a multi-functional role by driving the design process, as well as ensuring the successful, timely delivery of projects.
~  I develop innovative working environments that exceed client expectations, with a considerable impact on the productivity and behavior of personnel.
profile_positions.title: Senior Architect | Workplace Consultant

profile_positions.description:
I supervised a 10-member team of full-time equivalent employees and reported directly to the Chief Executive Officer. I directed an extensive portfolio of architecture and design projects, including urban planning, hotel complexes, and private residences. I generated detailed architectural sketches to be utilised by the construction teams. I partnered with the project teams to conduct feasibility studies, as well as produce comprehensive design and technical reports. I oversaw the project schedules, managed the allocated budgets, and monitored the expenses. I devised agile action plans oriented towards client requests for change orders and special projects. I established collaborative relationships with external contractors and drove contact negotiations.

~  I masterfully expedited the project delivery for a hotel renovation valued at €5M by one whole month, resulting in 100% functionality for the client throughout the season.
~  I reduced the number of contractors from 10 to three to enable streamlined operations, more efficient performance management, as well as easier maintenance of budget and timeline compliance. 
~  I contributed to the ‘City of Patras Sea Waterfront and Port’ project focused on developing guidelines for sustainable development, urban safety, accessibility, legislative support, as well as quality of life.
profile_positions.title: Senior Architect

company.name: European Programs Operator ESPA, Patras, Greece

profile_positions.company: European Programs Operator ESPA, Patras, Greece
profile_positions.description:
I delivered strategic consultancy on matters related to the modernisation of craft businesses, health and environmental companies, manufacturing enterprises, service companies, as well as tourism agencies. I reviewed policies and executed budget planning for European Programs. I partnered with project team members to collate comprehensive project reports offering insights to key stakeholders. I conducted site visits to perform inspections of the project installations.

~  I oversaw the annual budget valued at approximately €1.5M.
~  I served as a critical consultant on European Programs oriented towards the amelioration of corporate, manufacturing, and tourism businesses.
~  I ensured consistent successful project delivery aligned with the project budgets and time limitations.
~  I received personal recognition from the Chief Executive Officer for the submission of projects for final approval by the Ministry of Finance by end-of-year, despite our ongoing workload and its technical complexity.
profile_positions.title: Architect | Project Manager

company.name: Plegma SA and Patras Port Authority SA

profile_positions.company: Plegma SA and Patras Port Authority SA
profile_positions.description:
I provided agile consultancy to the Port Authority during the execution of a European Program oriented towards accessibility control on sea lines (ACCSEL). I reviewed project-related information comprising its scope and allocated budgets. I offered strategic advice during operations related to project planning and performance management. I delivered detailed reports comprising insights into financial activities, as well as time- and budget-related project targets.

~  I served as the organisational representative at meetings, events, and conferences.
~  I applied my positivity and stakeholder relationship management capabilities to realign the project towards its allocated timeline.
profile_positions.title: Architect | Project Manager
